name: The Harlem Shake vs Gangnam Dance Game
name_original: The Harlem Shake vs Gangnam Dance Game
description:
What's your favorite move: The Harlem Shake or Gangnam Dance? Play as either one in this epic dance game! The biggest YouTube legends ever battling it out. Have you got what it takes to tap with the best?!

Do you prefer Harlem Shake or Gangnam?! In this game it doesn't matter, you can choose to play as either one. This is more fun than a night out at the club!

It's fast, it's fun, it's exciting:

- Simple but powerful controls
- Amazing HD Retina graphics
- High Quality music
- Ultimate Sound effects
- Awesome Rhythm
- Play as Harlem Shaker
- Play as Gangnam
- Battle with your Game Center friends
- Mega Combo system

+ MUCH more fun ACTION!

Get ready to TAP your night away to the amazing tunes of The Harlem Shake or Gangnam. This great game will surprise you, entertain you & WOW you!! Download it now to shake it with the best....
